tool_description: Generates detailed utilization reports for diagnostic imaging equipment including usage statistics, efficiency metrics, and capacity analysis.

report_start_date.description: Start date for the reporting period

report_end_date.description: End date for the reporting period

equipment_ids.description: Array of equipment IDs to include in the report

report_type.description: Type of utilization report (summary, detailed, comparison, trend)

include_downtime.description: Whether to include equipment downtime analysis

group_by_period.description: Grouping period for data analysis (daily, weekly, monthly)

error_messages: Invalid date range: Start date must be before end date and within the last 2 years.
Equipment not found: One or more equipment IDs do not exist in the system.
Invalid report type: Use one of [summary, detailed, comparison, trend].
Too many equipment items: Maximum of 50 equipment items can be included in a single report.
Invalid grouping period: Use one of [daily, weekly, monthly].
Insufficient data: Not enough usage data available for the specified period and equipment.
usage: Provide report_start_date, report_end_date, equipment_ids array, and report_type to generate equipment utilization analysis reports.

report_summary.description: Executive summary of equipment utilization findings

utilization_percentages.description: Array of utilization percentages for each equipment item

total_procedures.description: Total number of procedures performed across all equipment

average_utilization.description: Average utilization percentage across all equipment

downtime_hours.description: Total downtime hours during the reporting period

recommendations.description: Array of recommendations for improving equipment utilization
